pr_title: Fix NPE during property to locator conversion

timeline.message: Fix NPE during property to locator conversion
Fix NPE during property to locator conversion

timeline.bodyText: I might be wrong but this may lead to circular dependencies
timeline.author: uarlouski

replies.bodyText: Sure thing it could, but the build looks ok? Won't usage of setter hide circular dependency if we have any?
replies.author: ikalinin1

replies.bodyText:
previously it also looked good before that failed first time, I mean that this thing does not reproduce stably
didn't get your second question :)
replies.author: uarlouski

replies.bodyText:
Let me rephrase :)
We should not workaround circular deps in most of the cases, they should be broken. So I would like to be aware if we got one here :)
replies.author: ikalinin1
